pkgmetadata.longdescription: DBI to construct MeSH-related package from sqlite file // The package is unified implementation of MeSH.db, MeSH.AOR.db, and MeSH.PCR.db and also is interface to construct Gene-MeSH package (MeSH.XXX.eg.db). loadMeSHDbiPkg import sqlite file and generate MeSH.XXX.eg.db.
